description: An individual who oversees customer relations, interacts with new, existing, and potential customers, designs and implements customer service policies, and compiles and analyzes customer data.
An individual who records, tracks, analyzes, and reports on the finances of the organization.
An individual or organization that designs plans and technical drawings for aesthetically pleasing and practical buildings.
An individual or organization that repairs, restores, cleans, operates, or otherwise keeps an asset ready for use.
An individual or organization that is responsible for the acquisition, installation, proper functioning, and decommissioning of a set of assets.
An individual or organization that is the subject of an audit.
An individual or organization that gathers, reviews, analyzes, and reports on the financial, legal, or other records of an organization, on behalf of third parties.
A person having managerial, supervisory, investigatory, or advisory powers over an organization.
An individual who leads and oversees an organization or a department's employees and operations.
An individual who initiates a campaign on behalf of a business.
An individual or organization that supplies material or assistance to a campaign.
An individual who is the intended recipient of the message of a campaign.
An individual who applies for a job or is nominated for a position in the organization.
An organization that approves the issuance of a credential certifying to the existence, level, or quality of one or more product characteristics.
An individual who makes decisions affecting a business as a whole and who represents the business to the public at large.
An individual who manages the finances of a business, including cash flow and financial planning.
An individual who defines and assesses financial, reputational, legal, market, or other kinds of risk that the organization may undertake.
An individual who ensures that a company complies with its outside regulatory and legal requirements and internal policies and bylaws.
An individual who prepares, negotiates, records, researches, and manages business contracts.
An individual who operates a transport conveyor (e.g., a train driver).
A legal entity that has, plans to have, or has had an agreement with the organization, or is a recipient or beneficiary of the organization's products or services.
An individual who ensures that the correct rules and tariffs are being applied.
An individual who obtains and analyzes data for a business in order to provide information and knowledge to assist with decision making.
An individual who performs compliance and/or enforcement services on behalf of third parties.
An individual who uses math and science to solve technical problems and designs, maintains, and tests products, assets, and materials.
An individual who helps enable groups during the course of an event to achieve specific objectives.
An individual or organization that inspects, maintains, and oversees grounds, buildings, and equipment to ensure that a workspace is safe and functional.
An individual who identifies, oversees, and provides support for matters specific to the operation or oversight of a venue or location.
An individual who oversees the preparation and publication of financial statements.
An individual who administers a finance business unit and has a delegated authority to approve financial transactions to a specified limit.
An individual who gathers and assesses information related to the finances of an organization.

An individual or organization that assesses and/or approves an order request from a customer for one or more products or services, creates the order based on the request, releases the order for fulfillment, oversees the fulfillment status, closes the order and acts as single-point-of-contact on any internal or external order related questions.
A local or national official body of state or a related agency under the auspices of that body.
An individual who negotiates terms for and onboards an employee.
An individual who has, plans to have, or has had a legal agreement with the organization, which may include compensation and other benefits, on a temporary or permanent basis.
An individual who identifies and assesses the current and future needs of the organization for individuals to perform work.
An individual or organization that responds to or manages the occurrence or consequences of one or more incidents.
An organization that aggregates information from different sources and presents it as a value-add service.
An individual who oversees the ordering, storing, receiving, and distributing of an organization's products, assets, and materials.
A person or organization who receives, shelves, organizes, logs, pulls, and cleans inventory materials, assets, or products.
An organization responsible for identifying, communicating with, evaluating, and contracting with investors.
An individual who performs routine technical tasks in laboratories, sets up laboratories and equipment, conducts lab-based experiments, and records and analyzes results.
An individual who oversees, identifies, and advises on legal issues in all departments and their interrelation.
An individual who installs machinery, performs routine maintenance checks, follows safety regulations, and operates mechanical or computer-operated equipment.
An individual who oversees the work for a business unit.
An individual who studies consumer preferences, business conditions, and other factors to assess potential sales of a product or service
An individual who creates and implements marketing budgets, procedures, and campaigns, and supervises, hires, and trains marketing employees.

An individual who oversees inventory and supplies, manages vendor relationships, assesses supply needs, coordinates delivery schedules, signs purchase orders, and tracks the flow of inventory through the organization's supply chain.
An individual who provides ongoing assistance, training, and instruction to employees.
An individual who manages a store's inventory and product displays to attract customers and increase sales
An individual who plans and manages the operation of a network.
An individual who plans and manages the performance of a network.
An individual who plans new or upgraded network infrastructure.
An individual who directs an operation, assembly line, process stream, or program.
An individual who assembles, processes, and prepares products, places raw materials or products into manufacturing assets, and checks equipment and products to ensure quality production.
A legal entity that has, plans to have, or has had an agreement with the organization for the provisioning of goods and/or services.
An individual who is responsible for coordinating, interacting with, evaluating, overseeing, and otherwise engaging with a partner on behalf of the organization.
An individual who defines a schedule for an initiative, operation, asset, material, or product.
An individual who assists or enables the organization to source and acquire assets, materials, or services.
An individual who arranges, directs, evaluates, approves, or assigns sourcing or acquisition work for the organization.
An individual who creates designs for new products, adding improvements to existing products and conducting market research for new product design ideas.
An individual who refines and tests designs for improvements to existing products and for new product ideas.
An individual who conceives, defines, determines, and oversees creation and distribution of a product or service on behalf of the business.
An individual who oversees the development of products, determines the overall vision of products, manages various backlog items, and decides which features match clients’ preferences.
An individual who packages finished products, compiles instructions and other product documentation, matches and logs entitlements, and organizes products for shipment.
An individual who creates, plans, oversees, and evaluates one or more initiatives in support of a set of related strategic goals.
An individual who creates, plans, oversees, and evaluates one or more initiatives.

An individual who verifies compliance with organization and regulatory polices, identifies trends or weaknesses in product developing and manufacturing processes, executes tests against regulatory requirements or controls, and is sometimes called quality control or quality assurance.
An individual or organization that receives a shipment item.
An individual who identifies and obtains human resources.
An individual or organization that creates, assesses, evaluates, and enforces legal, regulatory, or policy requirements on or for an organization.
An individual or organization that assesses or approves a request for one or more assets, materials, or services.
An individual who, on their own behalf or on behalf of others, makes a request for one or more assets, materials, or services.
An individual who assesses and mitigates danger, damage, or loss to the business.
An individual or organization that sends a shipment item.
An organization that ships items from a sender to a recipient.
An individual or organization that is responsible for initiating or paying for an initiative.
An individual who participates in the creation and execution of a strategy.
An individual or organization that provides goods or services to the organization.
An individual who subjects a product or service to an assessment of suitability or worth.
An individual who uses their technical and design skills to translate design concepts into actual products.
An individual who provides instruction.
An individual who oversees and approves training programs.
An individual who participates in a training course.
An individual who provides instruction to employees.
An individual responsible for the planning and operation of a transport service.
An individual who oversees and manages the assets of a business.
